page.title: 01The Edge of Everything
page.content: Our area is on the edge of, Local Authority, Parliamentary Constituency, Police and County, boundaries. We are also on edge of coal measures and just outside Peak district. We live in a desirable area say the estate agents. It is desirable if you enjoy rural community with very little industry, few facilities such s shops, entertainment or buses. Within a few miles we have towns providing all the facilities we lack and also work for many of us.The villages are thus 'dormitory' villages to a large extent and whilst there is a sense of community it is diluted by this fact. The communities in our area are separated by a valley through which the river Amber flows. The hillsides offer grazing for dairy cattle. The low hills on which the villages stand make them vulnerable to the weather
